item.title: Filming Thrips with Vishwa
item.description: This past month has been rather exciting due to a visit by OSU graduate student Vishwa Teja Kasoju. He is a student in the Mechanical & Aerospace engineering PhD program as part of Dr. Santhanakrishnan’s lab. Vishwa visited both UNC and Duke to get some footage of thrips flight and Mantis shrimp escape behaviors. My undergraduate student Kristen Armel and I assisted Vishwa in some of his thrips collecting and filming.
